EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO Partners Follow Up (1329173112.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners Follow Up (1329173112.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - 1024x768 - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Annette, It looks like we have had contracts with ITT Corporation in the past but since Exelis is a division on ITT Im sure they have a different contract and/or processes for becoming a vendor. I would be happy to reach out to the client to see if they are willing to negotiate a new contract since we have worked with ITT in the past. Please let me know if you would like for me to explore this option. Thank you,Nicolette ___________________________________Nicolette TaylorConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703.793.6281f: 703.793.6456e: <bbentley@mbopartners.com">ntaylor@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com<span style='mso-bookmark:_MailAutoSig> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: amcgough7@verizon.net [mailto:amcgough7@verizon.net] Sent: Monday, February 13, 2012 1:42 PM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: Re: MBO Partners Follow Up Hi, I don't think you have a contract with ITT Exelis. If that is not in place I cannot use MBO.ThanksAnnette
Sent from my iPad On Feb 13, 2012, at 12:34 PM, Nicolette Taylor <postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:ntaylor@mbopartners.com">ntaylor@mbopartners.com> wrote: Dear Annette, I wanted to follow up with you from our conversation regarding MBO Partners. I know you had expressed interest in using our services. Any update would be great and I look forward to hearing from you. Regards, Nicolette Nicolette TaylorConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703.793.6281f: 703.793.6456e: ntaylor@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed.
